title: General Cleaning Procedure (PSER-C920-0101) | Yönerge
text: Procedure No PSER-C920-0101V09 Effective Date 16-11-2016 Update Date 11-03-2021 Related Unit / Owner SER / Hizmetler Direktörlüğü Approved by BT / Board of Trustees Related Instruction Cleaning Services (ISER-C920-01) Aim The aim of this document is to lay out how the cleaning of indoor and outdoor areas of the University is done and followed up under the responsibility of the Cleaning Services Unit. Scope This document covers all cleaning-related activities of the Cleaning Services unit and cleaning company. Definitions / Abbreviations University: Sabancı University Cleaning Services: Services Directorate / Cleaning Services Unit. Cleaning company: The company from which the university receives services for the fulfillment of cleaning works. Call Center: It is the unit at Sabancı University that collects requests by telephone and electronic form and opens work orders electronically to the relevant units. SUTicket: Electronic recording software of requests collected by the Call Center. Cleaning Checklist: It is the electronic checklist in which the cleaning company officer evaluates the interior of the building in terms of cleaning standards and technical faults following the cleaning service. Cleaning Inspection Form: It is the electronic form in which the cleaning service is evaluated by giving scores to the inspected building together with the Cleaning Services unit and cleaning company officials. Implementation Steps Responsibility Outputs/ Timing 1.1. The cleaning service provided on the university campus is planned by the Cleaning Company in three different shifts, namely 08:00-16:00 / 16:00-00:00 / 00:00-08:00. Cleaning Services Every day except Sunday 1.2. The cleaning service provided in the 08:00-16:00 shift is carried out according to daily, weekly, monthly work plans and requests from the Call Center or SUTicket. Cleaning Services Cleaning Company Call Center Every day except Sunday 1.3. Call requests coming from the Call Center or via SUTicket are transferred to the Cleaning Company via SUTicket. The request is resolved as soon as possible. In case of need, a check is done and the call is closed through the system. Cleaning Services Cleaning Company Call Center As needed 1.4. Cleaning, monitoring and maintenance of the spaces are planned according to the content of the organization table throughout the university. Cleaning Services Cleaning Company As needed 1.5. Planned work tables are updated weekly and monthly, followed and checked. Necessary measures are taken, if any, regarding the missing works. Cleaning Services Cleaning Company On weekdays 1.6. In case of requests and/or complaints via e-mail, the problem is investigated as soon as possible and resolved if possible. The outcome is reported via temizlik@sabanciuniv.edu . Cleaning Services E-mail As needed 1.7. Open spaces, laboratories, workshops, studios in faculties are cleaned according to weekly / monthly work plans and requests from the Call Center or via SUTicket and windows and frames are cleaned from the exterior in the 08:00 - 16:00 shift. Cleaning Services Cleaning Company Call Center Every day except Sunday 1.8. Student dormitories are cleaned only in the 08:00-16:00 shift according to the schedule made by the Cleaning Services. Cleaning Services Cleaning Company Every day except Sunday 1.9. The service provided by the Cleaning Company in the first shift is between 08:00 and 16:00. The Cleaning Company directs the cleaning staff to the building or department where they will work during the day, according to the information in the daily work distribution list. Cleaning Company Every day except Sunday 1.10. The cleaning staff, who will go to the department where they will work in the morning shift, take the key to the cleaning supplies storage unit and the building’s master key by signing the key control book and/or list. Cleaning Company Cleaning Staff Every day except Sunday 1.11. Evening shift provides cleaning service only inside the building between 16:00-00:00 / 00:00-08:00. During these shifts, the faculties, administrative buildings and social areas are cleaned in detail and the buildings are prepared for use for the next day. Cleaning Services Cleaning Company Every day except Sunday 1.12. At the end of the work, the cleaning service in the buildings is controlled through electronic checklists by the Cleaning Company officials responsible for the shifts. Cleaning Services Cleaning Company Every day except Sunday 1.13. In all the three shifts, Cleaning Company officials report technical malfunctions to the Call Center via SUticket. Cleaning Company Call Center Every day 1.14. Cleaning staff working in each department deliver the keys at the end of the shift to the office of the Cleaning Company, by signing the key control book and/or list. Cleaning Company Cleaning Staff Every day 1.15. At the end of the shift, the keys delivered to the Cleaning Company's office are delivered to the Security Unit by the Cleaning Company officials, by signing the key checklist at the security control center, to be taken in the next shift. Cleaning Company Officer Security Unit Every day 1.16. The cleaning staff deliver the items they find in the department they work, without waiting, to the Cleaning Company officials. Cleaning Company officials deliver the found goods to the Security Control Center at the end of the shift with the Found Items Delivery Form(FSER-C94001-17) . A copy of the submitted form is also delivered to the Cleaning Services. Cleaning Services Cleaning Company Cleaning Company Officer Security Unit As needed 1.17. The inspection of the service provided by the Cleaning Company is done by the cleaning company officials with electronic cleaning checklists. Inspection is done by the Cleaning Company officials and Cleaning Services with spot checks and/or Monthly Inspection forms. Cleaning Services Cleaning Company Every day As needed 1.18. Cleaning Services and Cleaning Company Officials perform their monthly inspections together. In administrative, academic and social buildings, they evaluate the cleaning service provided by giving points mutually to the places in the buildings every two months. (FSER-C920-0101),(FSER-C920-0102),(FSER-C920-0104),(FSER-C920-0105),(FSER-C920-0106) Cleaning Services Cleaning Company Officer Once every two months 1.19. The shared areas, external environment cleaning and garbage collection services of the residences on the campus are applied according to the daily, weekly and monthly work plan.
